title: üö® Welcome to Zero: The Future of Email is Here üö®
body: We're building the future of email at Zero, and we'd love for you to be part of it!
subject: The Email Experience You've Been Waiting For
decodedBody:
We're building the future of email at Zero, and we'd love for you to be part of it!

Email hasn't changed much in decades, but we're changing that. Zero combines the reliability of email with modern features you'll actually love using. Our mission is to transform how you communicate online.

We're excited to have you on this journey with us as we reimagine what email can be in today's world. Welcome to Zero!

title: ‚ö° URGENT: Someone Wants to Pay You to Exist
body: Okay, not quite, but we do have a job for you. Are you in?
subject: Please Work for Us, We Are Begging
decodedBody:
Okay, not quite, but we do have a job for you. Are you in?

We've been stalking your profile for weeks and we're convinced you're exactly what our team needs. The position offers competitive salary, flexible hours, and a desk that's at least 70% stable.

Our last three developers mysteriously disappeared (unrelated to workload, we promise), so we're in a bit of a hurry. When can you start?

title: üéâ You Got a Job! (Just Kidding, But Let's Talk)
body: Hey, you look like someone who needs a paycheck. Want a job?
subject: Work 9-5, Make Money, Repeat
decodedBody: Hey, you look like someone who needs a paycheck. Want a job?
